Package leitej.log

Interface Config

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XmlObjectModelling
    public interface Config
extends XmlObjectModelling
    Object used exclusively to get and set configuration of Logger, owing to XMLOM concept.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
